author: BBC News
title: US Capitol riot 'podium guy' Adam Johnson gets 75 days in prison
description: A federal judge said the actions of Adam Johnson, 37, had made "a mockery" of the day's events.
content:
Image source, Win McNamee / Getty Images
A Florida resident photographed during the Capitol riots with a podium bearing the Speaker of the House seal has been sentenced to 75 days in prison.
